alert.note: Alert for Iberia; Upper St. Martin (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 5:39PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Iberia and west central St. Martin Parishes through 645 PM CDT... At 539 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Catahoula to 7 miles south of Butte La Rose to 6 miles north of Lake Fausse Pointe. Movement was west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Iberia, Catahoula, Breaux Bridge, St. Martinville, Jeanerette, Broussard, Loreauville, Cade, Butte La Rose, Lake Fausse Pointe and Parks. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana near mile marker 108. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
